alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Judith Basin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Meagher, southwestern Judith Basin and northeastern Gallatin Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of White Sulphur Springs to 15 miles north of Belgrade. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, pea size hail, and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White Sulphur Springs, Newlan Creek Reservoir, Lennep, Ringling, Martinsdale, Sapphire Village and Checkerboard. This includes the following highways... Highway 12 between mile markers 24 and 77. Highway 89 between mile markers 1 and 10, between mile markers 22 and 24, and between mile markers 39 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
